# Portfolio Project - Next.js 15 + React 19 + TypeScript + Tailwind CSS 4

## Project Overview
Modern portfolio website with animations, scroll spy, and responsive design.

## Tech Stack
- Next.js 15 (App Router)
- React 19
- TypeScript
- Tailwind CSS 4
- Framer Motion (for animations)

## Project Structure
- `/app` - Next.js App Router pages and layouts
- `/components` - Reusable React components
- `/sections` - Main portfolio sections (Hero, About, Projects, etc.)
- `/lib` - Utility functions and helpers
- `/types` - TypeScript type definitions

## Development Guidelines
- Use TypeScript for all files
- Follow React 19 best practices
- Implement responsive design mobile-first
- Use Framer Motion for smooth animations
- Implement scroll spy for navigation
